Subscribe.success.title: Success!
Subscribe.success.message: Thank you for subscribing for Jibrel updates. You will be the first one to learn about our launch. Stay tuned!
Subscribe.error.title: Oops!
Subscribe.error.message: Something went wrong. Please, try to submit the form one more time.
Home.welcome.title: Startup investing made simple, for everyone
Home.welcome.description: Jibrel enables startups and investors to connect in a previously unimaginable way to create capital formation.
Home.welcome.offer: Sign up for early access today!
Home.advantages.title: Advantages
Home.advantages.markets.title: Access to Global Markets
Home.advantages.markets.description: Jibrel empowers startups with tech tools that facilitate leaner, quicker and cheaper testing of their value propositions.
Home.advantages.transparency.title: Transparency for Investors
Home.advantages.transparency.description: Jibrel provides retail and professional investors globally with transparency of opportunities eliminating information asymmetries and subjectivity from the investment process.
Home.advantages.reach.title: Reach to Startups
Home.advantages.reach.description: Jibrel does not only bring better access to international investors, but also makes managing thousands of investors is now just as easy as managing three.
Home.whatsForYou.title: What’s for you?
Home.whatsForYou.globalLiquidity.title: Global Liquidity at a Fraction of the Cost and Time
Home.whatsForYou.globalLiquidity.descrip: Jibrel stimulates global capital formation and reduces market frictions by deploying best-in-class financial and regulatory technology empowering startups with reach and investors with access to a historically exclusive and marginal asset class.
Home.whatsForYou.getInEarly.title: Get in Early
Home.whatsForYou.getInEarly.description: Invest early in the disruption of multi-billion dollar industries alongside seasoned investors and industry veterans. Support the companies you believe in and want to see succeed in the future.
Home.whatsForYou.secureSimpleFast.title: It’s Secure, Simple and Fast
Home.whatsForYou.secureSimpleFast.descri: We’ve done the complicated stuff so you won’t have to. Jibrel is a regulated full-service online investment platform which offers a compliant, seamless and smart investor experience. To start investing, simply sign up, select your startup and invest!
Home.whatsForYou.experience.title: Experience the Potential of Exponential Technologies
Home.whatsForYou.experience.description: Tokenization of equity is a more efficient means of securitization which can unlock value beyond financial returns for startups, investors and ecosystem enablers. It redefines how companies are built, funded and managed.
Home.tagline.title: Jibrel: <0/> Reimagining how companies are built, funded and managed

SubscribeInvestor.input.typeOfAccount.ti: Which type of account you want to create?
SubscribeInvestor.input.typeOfAccount.op: Use an individual account if you want to invest on behalf of yourself.
Use organizational account if you want to invest on behalf of an accredited organization, such as a fund.
